meta.source: NAHB / HUD Residential Life Expectancy Standard
meta.note: Standard benchmarks for calculating depreciation and remaining useful life.

ROOFING.impact_description: Leaks lead to structural rot, mold, and insulation damage.

HVAC.impact_description: Mechanical failure often happens during extreme weather, leading to emergency replacement costs.

PLUMBING.impact_description: While modern pipes last 80+ years, 1970s polybutylene or older galvanized steel often fails prematurely.

ELECTRICAL.impact_description: Copper wiring is nearly permanent, but insulation and panel capacity become bottlenecks over 50 years.

WINDOWS.impact_description: Drafty windows increase energy bills by up to 25% and decrease indoor comfort.

WATER_HEATER.impact_description: Sudden failure often results in basement or closet flooding.

SIDING.impact_description: Rot and moisture intrusion lead to frame damage and mold.

GUTTERS.impact_description: Clogged or detached gutters cause foundation washout and basement leaks.

DECK.impact_description: Rotten ledger boards pose immediate collapse risk.

GARAGE_DOOR.impact_description: Spring failure can trap vehicles or cause injury.

DRIVEWAY.impact_description: Cracks allow water freeze-thaw cycles to destroy substrate.

FENCE.impact_description: Leaning sections reduce security and property value.

ATTIC_INSULATION.impact_description: Compressed insulation loses R-value, spiking HVAC costs.

SUMP_PUMP.impact_description: Failure during a storm guarantees basement flooding.

SMOKE_DETECTOR.impact_description: Expired sensors fail to detect fire, risking lives.

DISPOSAL.impact_description: Seized motor causes sink backup and plumbing clogs.

TOILET.impact_description: Wax ring failure causes hidden subfloor rot, though the porcelain lasts indefinitely.

PAINT_EXTERIOR.impact_description: Peeling paint exposes wood to rapid decay.

FLOORING_CARPET.impact_description: Traps allergens and wears out in high traffic areas.

SEPTIC_SYSTEM.impact_description: Drain field failure costs $15k+ to replace.

FURNACE.impact_description: Cracked heat exchangers leak carbon monoxide; critical safety risk.

AIR_CONDITIONER.impact_description: Efficiency drops 40% near end-of-life; refrigerant leaks are costly.

DISHWASHER.impact_description: Pump seal leaks often go unnoticed until subfloor rot occurs.

KITCHEN_FAUCET.impact_description: Internal corrosion leads to spray hose and handle leaks.
